steps.title: Here’s your objective.
steps.description:
In this mission, you’ll shoot a ball with the Lightning Tail.

Build SPIK3R 01.

steps.title: Let’s try it out!
steps.description: Place the Lightning Tail on a smooth surface, then download and run the program.

hints.Text:

2. Download and run the program.

3. Run the program from your EV3 Brick.
